mdRecord.dcterms:title: Washington Homestead, Mt. Vernon.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Bell & Bro. (Washington, D.C.)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of the west front of the Mansion by Bell & Bro., 1867, showing repairs taking place with a ladder leaning up against the fa√ßade to the far right and the central pediment appears to be unpainted. Mounted on yellow board. A label adhered to the reverse reads: Washington Homestead, Mt. Vernon. Photographed and Published by Bell & Bro., 480 Penna. Ave., Washington, D. C. Entered according to an Act of Congress, A. D., 1867, by F. H. Bell, in the District Court of the District of Columbia.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
Mansion Exterior
